content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"note-error\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Please note that if you are an employee of Emakina Austria, you are expected to continue using your current tool and process after 1st February to register your presence and absence hours/days. You will receive additional notice and guidance when and how to switch for the EPAM system.\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#A72014\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://vacation.epam.com/epm-vts-web/dashboard\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Vacation\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" is an internal EPAM resource for planning various types of leaves and tracking sick days. Feel free to check this document: \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/EPMVTSPUB/User+Guide\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Vacation User Guide\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Please note that that system might be available for you to visit \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"but will only contain accurate information from 6\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"th\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-superscript\",\"data\":{}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" February  (balances for 2023 plus carry forward days if applicable).\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" Should you experience a gap in balances, please contact your Resource Manager.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Employees\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-underlined\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" are obliged \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"to register time-off in the Vacation system\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\". Per agreement with resource manager, contractors may be asked to report ‘leave without pay’ in Vacation system. \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"You are expected to use the Vacation system for dates from 1st February 2023 (Vacation system cutover dates) and you will receive a training on the 7\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"th\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-superscript\",\"data\":{}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" February on the use of the system.\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Prior to taking a vacation, you must register it in the Vacation Portal. Prior to submitting a vacation request, please communicate your plans with your RM and PM and make sure you’ve looked through \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/EPMVTSPUB/Rules+in+your+location\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"business rules in your location\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"To register your vacation, click \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"+ Add Request\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" and fill in the form.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Check this user guide \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/EPMVTSPUB/User+Guide#Userguide-Create\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Create Vacation Request\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" to get familiar with the portal's basic functionality.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"After filling in all required fields, click \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Save As Draft\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" or \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Submit\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If you click Submit, your manager will receive a notification and confirm or cancel your request. You will receive a notification from \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Auto VACATION Notify\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" with information about your manager's decision:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":18827,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/863d3f55-62c7-4686-8183-c5f5dcbc79bc/vac.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/863d3f55-62c7-4686-8183-c5f5dcbc79bc/vac.png?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"vac.png\",\"name\":\"vac.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"863d3f55-62c7-4686-8183-c5f5dcbc79bc\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":528,\"height\":399},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-quote\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Don't forget to turn on Automatic Replies in Outlook if you are on vacation or offline during working hours\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]}}"
